## IfExtends type

If Condition\[0\] extends Condition\[1\], return Case1, else return Case2.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type IfExtends<Condition extends [unknown, unknown], Case1, Case2> = [
  Condition[0],
] extends [Condition[1]]
  ? Case1
  : Case2
```

## Example


```ts
 // Expect: 1
 type Foo = IfExtends<[true, boolean], 1, 2>
```
